```lean4
import Mathlib

open Set Topology Filter Polynomial MeasureTheory

/--
In the plane, let $C$ be a closed convex set that contains $(0,0) but no other point with integer coordinations. Suppose that $A(C)$, the area of $C$, is equally distributed among the four quadrants. Prove that $A(C) \leq 4$.
-/
theorem putnam_1979_b5
(C : Set (ℝ × ℝ))
(hC : IsClosed C ∧ Convex ℝ C ∧ (0,0) ∈ C)
(hCnint : ∀ a b : ℤ, (a ≠ 0 ∨ b ≠ 0) → ((a : ℝ), (b : ℝ)) ∉ C)
(hCeven : volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≥ 0 ∧ p.2 ≥ 0}) = volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≥ 0 ∧ p.2 ≤ 0}) ∧ volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≥ 0 ∧ p.2 ≤ 0}) = volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≤ 0 ∧ p.2 ≥ 0}) ∧ volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≤ 0 ∧ p.2 ≥ 0}) = volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≤ 0 ∧ p.2 ≤ 0}))
: volume C ≤ 4 :=
sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_1979_b5
(C : Set (ℝ × ℝ))
(hC : IsClosed C ∧ Convex ℝ C ∧ (0,0) ∈ C)
(hCnint : ∀ a b : ℤ, (a ≠ 0 ∨ b ≠ 0) → ((a : ℝ), (b : ℝ)) ∉ C)
(hCeven : volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≥ 0 ∧ p.2 ≥ 0}) = volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≥ 0 ∧ p.2 ≤ 0}) ∧ volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≥ 0 ∧ p.2 ≤ 0}) = volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≤ 0 ∧ p.2 ≥ 0}) ∧ volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≤ 0 ∧ p.2 ≥ 0}) = volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≤ 0 ∧ p.2 ≤ 0}))
: volume C ≤ 4 := by
  have h1 := hCeven.1
  have h2 := hCeven.2.1
  have h3 := hCeven.2.2
  have h4 := hCnint 0 0
  have h5 := hCnint 1 0
  have h6 := hCnint (-1) 0
  have h7 := hCnint 0 1
  have h8 := hCnint 0 (-1)
  have h9 := hCnint 1 1
  have h10 := hCnint (-1) 1
  have h11 := hCnint 1 (-1)
  have h12 := hCnint (-1) (-1)
  simp_all [Set.mem_inter_iff, Set.mem_setOf_eq, Set.mem_singleton_iff]
  <;> norm_num
  <;> linarith [Real.pi_pos]
```

theorem putnam_1979_b5
(C : Set (ℝ × ℝ))
(hC : IsClosed C ∧ Convex ℝ C ∧ (0,0) ∈ C)
(hCnint : ∀ a b : ℤ, (a ≠ 0 ∨ b ≠ 0) → ((a : ℝ), (b : ℝ)) ∉ C)
(hCeven : volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≥ 0 ∧ p.2 ≥ 0}) = volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≥ 0 ∧ p.2 ≤ 0}) ∧ volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≥ 0 ∧ p.2 ≤ 0}) = volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≤ 0 ∧ p.2 ≥ 0}) ∧ volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≤ 0 ∧ p.2 ≥ 0}) = volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≤ 0 ∧ p.2 ≤ 0}))
: volume C ≤ 4 := by
  have h₁ := hCeven.1
  have h₂ := hCeven.2.1
  have h₃ := hCeven.2.2

  have h₅ := hCnint 1 0
  have h₆ := hCnint 0 1

import Mathlib

open Set Topology Filter Polynomial MeasureTheory

/--
In the plane, let $C$ be a closed convex set that contains $(0,0) but no other point with integer coordinations. Suppose that $A(C)$, the area of $C$, is equally distributed among the four quadrants. Prove that $A(C) \leq 4$.
-/
theorem putnam_1979_b5
(C : Set (ℝ × ℝ))
(hC : IsClosed C ∧ Convex ℝ C ∧ (0,0) ∈ C)
(hCnint : ∀ a b : ℤ, (a ≠ 0 ∨ b ≠ 0) → ((a : ℝ), (b : ℝ)) ∉ C)
(hCeven : volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≥ 0 ∧ p.2 ≥ 0}) = volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≥ 0 ∧ p.2 ≤ 0}) ∧ volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≥ 0 ∧ p.2 ≤ 0}) = volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≤ 0 ∧ p.2 ≥ 0}) ∧ volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≤ 0 ∧ p.2 ≥ 0}) = volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≤ 0 ∧ p.2 ≤ 0}))
: volume C ≤ 4 :=

```lean4
theorem putnam_1979_b5
(C : Set (ℝ × ℝ))
(hC : IsClosed C ∧ Convex ℝ C ∧ (0,0) ∈ C)
(hCnint : ∀ a b : ℤ, (a ≠ 0 ∨ b ≠ 0) → ((a : ℝ), (b : ℝ)) ∉ C)
(hCeven : volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≥ 0 ∧ p.2 ≥ 0}) = volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≥ 0 ∧ p.2 ≤ 0}) ∧ volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≥ 0 ∧ p.2 ≤ 0}) = volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≤ 0 ∧ p.2 ≥ 0}) ∧ volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≤ 0 ∧ p.2 ≥ 0}) = volume (C ∩ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ≤ 0 ∧ p.2 ≤ 0}))
: volume C ≤ 4 := by
  have h1 : volume C ≤ 4 := by
    have h2 := hCeven.1
    have h3 := hCeven.2.1
    have h4 := hCeven.2.2
    have h5 : volume C ≤ 4 := by
      -- Use the given conditions and properties of convex sets to bound the volume
      have h6 := hCnint 0 0
      have h7 := hCnint 1 1
      have h8 := hCnint (-1) 1
      have h9 := hCnint 1 (-1)
      have h10 := hCnint (-1) (-1)
      have h11 := hCnint 2 0
      have h12 := hCnint 0 2
      have h13 := hCnint (-2) 0
      have h14 := hCnint 0 (-2)
      have h15 := hCnint 2 2
      have h16 := hCnint (-2) (-2)
      norm_num [Set.mem_setOf_eq, Set.mem_inter_iff] at h6 h7 h8 h9 h10 h11 h12 h13 h14 h15 h16
      <;>
        simp_all [volume_Icc, Real.volume_Icc, Real.volume_Ioc, Real.volume_Ico, Real.volume_Ioo,
          Real.volume_Icc, Real.volume_Ioc, Real.volume_Ico, Real.volume_Ioo]
      <;>
        norm_num
      <;>
        linarith [hC.1, hC.2.1, hC.2.2, h2, h3, h4, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16]
    exact h5
  
  exact h1
```
